title: Experience the new and improved Santorini Airport in MSFS
description:
Santorini Airport (LGSR) has recently been updated. Located north of the village of Kamari, the airport functions for both military and civilian purposes. Following the apron's redesign in 2021, it can now accommodate up to nine civilian airliners simultaneously. Santorini stands out as one of the few Cyclades Islands that boasts a significant airport.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/68N4Mm-u8bg
